About.name: Eduardo
About.intro: I'm a solution-oriented Software Engineer with a background in Design, from Brazil.
About.work: I don't run from a good technical challenge and work on lots of stuff.
About.learning: I'm always learning new abilities, currently proficient in Node.js, Vue.js, React and getting up to par in .NET.
About.cta: Take a look at my background bellow and, in case you're interested,

intro.tools: Usually the tools I use for the job, depend on the job.
intro.noOneSize: There's no one-size fits all, and as such I'm always trying out new technologies, and constantly learning.
intro.familiar: The following technologies are the ones I worked directly with or studied on my own:

lakanSoftwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
lakanSoftwareEngineer.description: Contributed to the development of psychology platform Lakan.ai, providing product design expertise and teamworking under tight deadlines. Implemented a live speech-to-text transcription, a key business feature to the app. Helped the team with usability and design challenges, planning and building user flows and improving user experience. Delivered reliable backend solutions for production applications by developing ASP.NET Core APIs and resolving complex integration challenges.

ckreativSoftwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
ckreativSoftwareEngineer.description: Implemented a design system and improved the UX of the Nuvend B2B sales app, positively impacting around 600 salespeople across 5 Brazilian states and reducing support tickets by 80%. Led the development of an AI chatbot that answers users natural language questions about the company's knowledge base. Helped to increase customer acquisition by 20% by integrating with Stripe, simplifying the product's subscription billing for our clients. Designed and deployed reliable software solutions, leveraging cloud environments while streamlining continuous deployment pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker.

ckreativJuniorSoftwareEngineer.title: Junior Software Engineer
ckreativJuniorSoftwareEngineer.description: Maintained the Ckreativ ERP platform and improved the product UX for dozens of businesses, increasing user satisfaction and reducing support tickets. Supported company's teams by providing technical expertise, creating workflows that reduced project delivery time facilitating seamless software delivery.

ckreativDesigner.title: Designer
ckreativDesigner.description: Designed and tested user interfaces, improving accessibility and user engagement. Collaborated with the engineering team to build designed products.

getmoreUXDesigner.title: Designer
getmoreUXDesigner.description: Served as a design generalist, creating dozens of presentations and layouts for print and other media, for internal and external company communication efforts. Specialized in UI design, developing wireframes and prototypes of varying complexity for key client YALO, and designed email marketing layouts (Unilever, Banco next).

brickAbodeDesigner.title: Designer
brickAbodeDesigner.description: Worked on many different fronts, the most expressive ones being: Produced and edited audiovisual materials using non-linear editing software (Adobe Creative Cloud, Blackmagic Davinci Resolve), and managed recording hardware. Developed a self-recording studio for hundreds of videos, including setting up cameras, voice capture devices, green screening, lighting, and automated Python video editing with YouTube API integration.

productionIntern.title: Production Intern
productionIntern.description: I created video content and automated production workflows using industry tools. Improved content delivery efficiency.

designIntern.title: Design Intern
designIntern.description: I crafted internal and external communication materials following brand guidelines.

computerScience.title: Computer Science
computerScience.description: Studying algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles with focus on full-stack development. Developing skills in systems design, cloud computing, and modern programming paradigms through hands-on projects.

design.title: Design
design.description: Studied comprehensive design principles including visual communication, user-centered design, and design thinking methodologies. Participated in research projects focused on interface design and user experience.
